en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Shenzhen

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Shenzhen tomorrow morning (August 16) to attend a seminar on co-operation in legal services between Hong Kong and the Mainland.

Representatives from Hong Kong's legal sector, the Departments of Justice in Guangdong and Fujian and the Bureaux of Justice in Beijing, Shanghai and Shenzhen will share their views during the seminar.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon of the same day.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（八月十六日）上午訪問深圳，出席香港與內地法律服務業交流合作座談會。
會上，香港法律界代表和來自廣東、福建、北京、上海及深圳的司法廳或司法局的代表將就法律服務業合作交流意見。
袁國強將於同日下午返回香港。
